017package org.spongepowered.configurate;
018
019import org.checkerframework.checker.nullness.qual.Nullable;
020
021import java.util.LinkedList;
022
023/**
024 * A visitor to traverse node hierarchies in a depth-first order
025 * <p>
026 * Instances of stateful implementations may be reusable by taking advantage of the state object. During each
027 * visitation, a visitor will experience the node tree as a sequence of events, described by the following
028 * pseudo-grammar:
029 *
030 * <pre>
031 * mappingNode: enterMappingNode node* exitMappingNode
032 * listNode: enterListNode node* exitListNode
033 *
034 * node: enterNode
035 *      (mappingNode
036 *       | listNode
037 *       | enterScalarNode)
038 *
039 * visit: newState?
040 *        beginVisit
041 *        node*
042 *        endVisit
043 * </pre>
044 * <p>
045 * If the starting node has no value, no node events will be received. Otherwise, the first event received will be for
046 * the starting node itself, and will continue from there.
047 * <p>
048 * The children to visit for list and mapping nodes will only be collected after both the {@code enterNode} and {@code
049 * enter(List|Mapping)Node} methods have been executed for the node, and changes to the node values may be made to
050 * control which nodes will be visited.
051 * <p>
052 * Any exceptions thrown within the visitor will result in the visitation ending immediately and the exception being
053 * rethrown within the visit method
054 * <p>
055 * There are a few specializations of the visitor interface available: {@link Stateless} carries no state and can act as
056 * a functional interface type, and {@link Safe} which throws no checked exceptions and therefore can be visited without
057 * having to handle any exceptions.
058 *
059 * @param <N> The type of node to visit
060 * @param <S> A state object that will be used for one visit
061 * @param <T> The terminal value, that can be returned at the end of the visit
062 * @param <E> exception type that may be thrown
063 * @see ScopedConfigurationNode#visit(ConfigurationVisitor) to execute this configuration visitation
064 */
065public interface ConfigurationVisitor<N extends ConfigurationNode, S, T, E extends Exception> {
066
067    /**
068     * Begin the visitation using a newly created state object
069     *
070     * @param node The node to start visiting from
071     * @return The terminal value
072     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
073     */
074    default T visit(N node) throws E {
075        S state = newState();
076        return visit(node, state);
077    }
078
079    /**
080     * Executes a depth-first visitation of the provided configuration node. It is recommended to directly access a
081     * ScopedConfigurationNode where possible
082     *
083     * @param node  The node to begin from
084     * @param state A state object to begin with
085     * @return The terminal value
086     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
087     * @see ScopedConfigurationNode#visit(ConfigurationVisitor) for the recommended visitation method
088     */
089    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
090    default T visit(N node, S state) throws E {
091        if (node instanceof ScopedConfigurationNode) { // bleh
092            return ((ScopedConfigurationNode<? extends N>) node).visit(this, state);
093        }
094
095        beginVisit(node, state);
096        if (!node.isMap() && !node.isList() && node.isEmpty()) {
097            LinkedList<Object> toVisit = new LinkedList<>(); // a list of N | VisitorNodeEnd
098            toVisit.add(node);
099
100            @Nullable Object active;
101            while ((active = toVisit.pollFirst()) != null) {
102                @Nullable N current = (N) VisitorNodeEnd.popFromVisitor(active, this, state);
103                if (current == null) {
104                    continue;
105                }
106
107                enterNode(current, state);
108                if (current.isMap()) {
109                    enterMappingNode(current, state);
110                    toVisit.addFirst(new VisitorNodeEnd(current));
111                    toVisit.addAll(0, current.getChildrenMap().values());
112                } else if (current.isList()) {
113                    enterListNode(current, state);
114                    toVisit.addFirst(new VisitorNodeEnd(current));
115                    toVisit.addAll(0, current.getChildrenList());
116                } else {
117                    enterScalarNode(current, state);
118                }
119            }
120        }
121        return endVisit(state);
122    }
123
124    /**
125     * Called to provide a state object if a visit is initiated without one already existing
126     *
127     * @return A new state object to be passed through the rest of this visit
128     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
129     */
130    S newState() throws E;
131
132    /**
133     * Called at the beginning of the visit with a state object created.
134     *
135     * @param node  the root node
136     * @param state the state
137     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
138     */
139    void beginVisit(N node, S state) throws E;
140
141    /**
142     * Called once per node, for every node
143     *
144     * @param node  The current node
145     * @param state provided state
146     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
147     */
148    void enterNode(N node, S state) throws E;
149
150    /**
151     * Called after {@link #enterNode(ConfigurationNode, Object)} for mapping nodes
152     *
153     * @param node  current node
154     * @param state provided state
155     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
156     */
157    void enterMappingNode(N node, S state) throws E;
158
159    /**
160     * Called after {@link #enterNode(ConfigurationNode, Object)} for list nodes
161     *
162     * @param node  current node
163     * @param state provided state
164     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
165     */
166    void enterListNode(N node, S state) throws E;
167
168    /**
169     * Called after {@link #enterNode(ConfigurationNode, Object)} for scalar nodes
170     *
171     * @param node  current node
172     * @param state provided state
173     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
174     */
175    void enterScalarNode(N node, S state) throws E;
176
177    /**
178     * Called for a list node after the node and any of its children have been visited
179     *
180     * @param node  The node that has been visited
181     * @param state provided state
182     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
183     */
184    void exitMappingNode(N node, S state) throws E;
185
186    /**
187     * Called for a list node after the node and any of its children have been visited
188     *
189     * @param node  The node that has been visited
190     * @param state provided state
191     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
192     */
193    void exitListNode(N node, S state) throws E;
194
195    /**
196     * Called after every node has been visited, to allow for cleanup and validation
197     *
198     * @param state provided state
199     * @return a terminal value
200     * @throws E when thrown by implementation
201     */
202    T endVisit(S state) throws E;
203
204    /**
205     * Stateless specialization of visitors, where both the state and terminal type are Void
206     *
207     * @param <N> The node type
208     */
209    @FunctionalInterface
210    interface Stateless<N extends ConfigurationNode, E extends Exception> extends ConfigurationVisitor<N, Void, Void, E> {
211        @Override
212        default Void newState() {
213            return null;
214        }
215
216        @Override
217        default void beginVisit(N node, Void state) throws E {
218            beginVisit(node);
219        }
220
221        @Override
222        default void enterNode(N node, Void state) throws E {
223            enterNode(node);
224        }
225
226        @Override
227        default void enterMappingNode(N node, Void state) throws E {
228            enterMappingNode(node);
229        }
230
231        @Override
232        default void enterListNode(N node, Void state) throws E {
233            enterListNode(node);
234        }
235
236        @Override
237        default void enterScalarNode(N node, Void state) throws E {
238            enterScalarNode(node);
239        }
240
241        @Override
242        default void exitMappingNode(N node, Void state) throws E {
243            exitMappingNode(node);
244        }
245
246        @Override
247        default void exitListNode(N node, Void state) throws E {
248            exitListNode(node);
249        }
250
251        @Override
252        default Void endVisit(Void state) throws E {
253            endVisit();
254            return null;
255        }
256
257        /**
258         * Called at the beginning of the visit with a state object created.
259         *
260         * @param node The root node
261         * @throws E as required by implementation
262         */
263        default void beginVisit(N node) throws E {
264        }
265
266        /**
267         * Called once per node, for every node
268         *
269         * @param node The current node
270         * @throws E as required by implementation
271         */
272        void enterNode(N node) throws E;
273
274        /**
275         * Called after {@link #enterNode(ConfigurationNode, Object)} for mapping nodes
276         *
277         * @param node current node
278         * @throws E when thrown by implementation
279         */
280        default void enterMappingNode(N node) throws E {
281        }
282
283        /**
284         * Called after {@link #enterNode(ConfigurationNode, Object)} for list nodes
285         *
286         * @param node current node
287         * @throws E when thrown by implementation
288         */
289        default void enterListNode(N node) throws E {
290        }
291
292        /**
293         * Called after {@link #enterNode(ConfigurationNode, Object)} for scalar nodes
294         *
295         * @param node current node
296         * @throws E when thrown by implementation
297         */
298        default void enterScalarNode(N node) throws E {
299        }
300
301        /**
302         * Called for a mapping node after the node and any of its children have been visited
303         *
304         * @param node The node that has been visited
305         * @throws E when thrown by implementation
306         */
307        default void exitMappingNode(N node) throws E {
308        }
309
310        /**
311         * Called for a list node after the node and any of its children have been visited
312         *
313         * @param node The node that has been visited
314         * @throws E when thrown by implementation
315         */
316        default void exitListNode(N node) throws E {
317        }
318
319        /**
320         * Called after every node has been visited, to allow for cleanup and validation
321         *
322         * @throws E when thrown by implementation
323         */
324        default void endVisit() throws E {
325        }
326    }
327
328    /**
329     * A subinterface for visitors that do not throw any checked exceptions during their execution
330     *
331     * @param <N> node type
332     * @param <S> state type
333     * @param <T> terminal value type
334     */
335    interface Safe<N extends ConfigurationNode, S, T> extends ConfigurationVisitor<N, S, T, VisitorSafeNoopException> {
336        @Override
337        default T visit(N node) {
338            return visit(node, newState());
339        }
340
341        @Override
342        default T visit(N node, S state) {
343            try {
344                return ConfigurationVisitor.super.visit(node, state);
345            } catch (VisitorSafeNoopException e) {
346                throw new Error("Exception designed not to be thrown was thrown :(");
347            }
348        }
349
350        @Override
351        S newState();
352
353        @Override
354        void beginVisit(N node, S state);
355
356        @Override
357        void enterNode(N node, S state);
358
359        @Override
360        void enterMappingNode(N node, S state);
361
362        @Override
363        void enterListNode(N node, S state);
364
365        @Override
366        void enterScalarNode(N node, S state);
367
368        @Override
369        void exitMappingNode(N node, S state);
370
371        @Override
372        void exitListNode(N node, S state);
373
374        @Override
375        T endVisit(S state);
376    }
377}
